data.title: Elinor Ostrom Winner of the 2009 Nobel Prize in Economics
data.meta_description: Elinor Ostrom, the 2009 Nobel Prize Laureate in Economics, at the Nobel Prize Internet Archive.
data.text:
2009 Nobel Laureate in Economics

for her analysis of economic governance, especially the commons

Background

Born: August 7, 1933

Place of birth: Los Angeles, CA, USA

Residence: United States

Affiliation: Indiana University

Address:

408 N. Indiana Ave, Room 230A

Bloomington, IN 47408

Tel: (812) 855-0441

E-mail: ostrom@indiana.edu

Education:

University of California, Los Angeles, Political Science, PhD 1965
